selector.description: The selector of the component to use in the example

path.description: The path at which to create the example component file, relative to the current workspace. Default is a folder with the same name as the component in the project root.

targetPath.description: The path at which to create the example component file, relative to the current workspace. Default is a folder with the same name as the selector in /src/app/examples/.

examplesPath.description: The path of the directory where the example files are located. Defaults to /examples/

flat.description: Create the new files at the top level of the current project.

usePwd.description: A flag to override the value of targetPath with the pwd
